title: Mexico’s Supreme Court decriminalizes abortion nationwide
description: Mexico’s Supreme Court has thrown out all criminal penalties for abortion

title: Missing windsurfer from Space Coast is second Florida death from Idalia
description: A windsurfer who went missing off Florida’s Space Coast the day after Hurricane Idalia made landfall last week has been declared the state’s second death from the Category 3 storm

title: 11-year-old boy to stand trial for mother's murder
description: An 11-year-old Wisconsin boy will stand trial for his mother's murder. Police testified family members were worried the motive behind the homicide was a VR headset.

title: Federal judge orders buoys in Rio Grande River moved to Texas riverbank
description: The State of Texas has been ordered to move the barriers it placed in the Rio Grande River to the state’s side of the river.

title: Judge halts California school district's transgender policy amid lawsuit
description: A judge has halted the Chino Valley Unified School District's mandatory transgender 'outing' policy.

title: Hurricane Lee: Projected path, maps and hurricane tracker
description: Hurricane Lee is forecast to quickly intensify to an extremely dangerous major hurricane.

title: Special counsel intends to bring indictment against Hunter Biden by month's end
description: David Weiss was appointed special counsel in the case last month.

title: Schools dismiss early, teach online as blast of heat hits northeastern US
description: A blast of late summer heat caused disruptions Wednesday for schools from Michigan to Virginia, with some districts dismissing students early and others holding classes online just days into the new academic year

title: Burning Man is ending, but the cleanup from heavy flooding is far from over
description: The rain clouds have passed and the temple has burned

title: Couple kidnapped from home, 5 kids left behind: Police
description: San Antonio police are searching for a man and woman who were kidnapped from their home Wednesday morning.

title: WATCH:  Mother surprises daughter with thoughtful surprise from late dad
description: Bride Natalie Crockett couldn’t hold back her tears when she found a patch from her late father's shirt sewn to her wedding dress with a special message.

title: WATCH:  Otter unmasked as culprit behind koi theft at hotel pond
description: A hotel in England uncovered the culprit behind the theft of 50 koi carp valued at over $125,000 - a sneaky otter who managed to evade their protective electric fence.

title: Fulton County judge hears arguments on splitting up election interference case
description: A Fulton County judge is hearing arguments today from two defendants in the Georgia election interference case who are seeking to sever their cases from the others.

title: To help curb terrorism and violence threats, DHS awards $20M to local communities
description: The Department of Homeland Security on Wednesday announced $20 million in grant funding aimed at preventing targeted violence and terrorism in the United States.

title: Prosecutors ask judge to revoke bond of mother of Virginia boy who shot teacher
description: Federal prosecutors are asking a judge to revoke the bond for the mother of a Virginia boy who shot and wounded his first-grade teacher after she allegedly failed multiple drug tests while awaiting sentencing on felony charges

title: Connecticut farm worker is paralyzed after being attacked by a bull
description: A 59-year-old Connecticut man has been seriously injured after being attacked by a bull at the farm where he was working

title: Group sues to block Trump from 2024 ballot, citing 14th Amendment
description: CREW on Wednesday filed a lawsuit seeking to bar Trump from the 2024 ballot in Colorado under Section 3 of the 14th Amendment based on his alleged involvement in Jan. 6

title: Brazil storm leaves at least 27 dead and 1,600 homeless while families plead for help
description: Authorities in southern Brazil say at least 27 people have died after a fierce storm caused floods in several cities in the region

title: South African conservation NGO to release 2,000 rhinos into the wild
description: Conservation Group African Parks has announced it is set to release 2,000 southern white rhinos into the wild in will be one of Africa’s largest rewilding programs.

title: Spain soccer player Jenni Hermoso accuses Luis Rubiales of sexual assault for kiss
description: Spanish state prosecutors say soccer player Jenni Hermoso has accused Luis Rubiales of sexual assault for kissing her on the lips without her consent after the Women’s World Cup final

title: Cruise passenger reported missing after ship returns to Florida
description: A guest aboard a Carnival cruise ship was reported missing by family Monday morning, according to the Miami-Dade Police Department.

title: South African conservation NGO to release 2,000 rhinos into the wild
description: Conservation Group African Parks has announced it is set to release 2,000 southern white rhinos into the wild in will be one of Africa’s largest rewilding programs.

title: China's premier is on a charm offensive as ASEAN summit protests Beijing's aggression
description: In talks with Southeast Asian leaders Wednesday in the Indonesian capital, Chinese Premier Li Qiang underscored his country’s importance as the world’s second-biggest economy and as the top trading partner of the region

title: More than 5 million people have been displaced by monthslong conflict in Sudan: UN
description: The United Nations' migration agency says more than 5 million people have been displaced by the monthslong fighting in Sudan

title: WATCH:  Drone captures exodus from Burning Man
description: Drone video captures a throng of vehicles leaving the site of Burning Man, after heavy rains caused chaos at the remote desert festival.

title: Alex Murdaugh's lawyers allege court clerk tampered with jury in double murder trial
description: Defense attorneys allege Colleton County Clerk of Court Rebecca Hill tampered with the jury in Alex Murdaugh's double murder trial.

title: Trump was warned FBI could raid Mar-a-Lago, according to attorney's voice memos
description: Former President Trump was warned the FBI could raid Mar-a-Lago if he didn't comply with a DOJ subpoena, according to voice memos made by Trump attorney Evan Corcoran.

title: WATCH:  Australian surfer takes pet python along for a ride
description: A surfer with a pet python decided to take the reptile out for a spin on his board, with drone footage showing the pair enjoying the waves in the sunshine.

title: In historic legal win, Montana teens see an end to climate change denial
description: Two Montana teenagers who successfully sued their state over climate change spoke exclusively to ABC News about the impact of their legal victory on the environment.

title: Secretary of State Blinken makes 4th secret visit to Ukraine
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken made an unannounced trip to Ukraine on Wednesday, his fourth trip to the country since Russia's invasion, the State Department said.

title: How Kim Jong Un may travel to Russia for another meeting with Putin
description: Kim traveled aboard an armored train in the past.

title: UK says it will declare Russia’s Wagner mercenary group a terrorist organization
description: The U.K. says it will declare Russia’s Wagner mercenary group a banned terrorist organization

title: 3 rescued from Coral Sea after multiple shark attacks damaged inflatable catamaran
description: Three rescued from Coral Sea after multiple shark attacks damaged inflatable catamaran.

title: Airbnb limits reservations in New York as short-term rental rules go into effect
description: New regulations on short-term rentals have gone into effect in New York City
